original_text: Then the dragon became furious with the woman and went off to make war on the rest of her offspring, on those who keep the commandments of God and hold to the testimony of Jesus. And he stood on the sand of the sea.
korean_text: 용이 여자에게 분노하여 돌아가서 그 여자의 남은 자손 곧 하나님의 계명을 지키며 예수의 증거를 가진 자들과 더불어 싸우려고 바다 모래 위에 서 있더라

sentences.original_text: Then the dragon became furious with the woman
and went off to make war
on the rest of her offspring
on those who keep the commandments of God
and hold to the testimony of Jesus
And he stood on the sand of the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 바다 모래 위에 섰다
